long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into a visual masterpiece that echoes Senua’s strength and the atmospheric beauty of her journey.

Witness captivating animations that capture the essence of this critically acclaimed game every time you open a new tab.

Features:

➕ Addable Shortcuts: Customize your new tab with links to frequently visited sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Easily browse the web using your preferred search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This secure, lightweight extension offers a seamless experience, respects your privacy, and can be uninstalled anytime via the settings menu.

Explore more live wallpapers inspired by epic games, iconic characters, and cinematic visuals. Additional tools include a note-taking feature, a privacy policy, and a direct uninstall option.
